summary: An Ordinance granting to A. Kristoferson, Inc. its successors and assigns, a franchise to construct, maintain and operate pipes for refrigeration purposes in a portion of First Avenue South, connecting the building of said granite located on Lot one (1), Block three hundred seventeen (317), Seattle Tide Land, with the plant of the Seattle Ice Company located on Lot ten (10), Block three hundred thirty-seven (337), Seattle Tide Lands, for a limited period of years, under certain terms and conditions.
